sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1a7584a4db8200101e349b81ca9619e5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">state=6^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="6"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpConTicketRestart</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

try { 
	var originator = current.correlation_display;
	if(originator == 'SMA_OPCON') {
		gs.info("Ticket resolved so set SMA_OPCON task " + current.correlation_id + " to restart");
		var retinfo = current.correlation_id;
		var address = retinfo.split(",");
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_176837_opconapi.updateJobStatusByJobId', 'postStatus');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('address', address[0]);
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('status', 'restart');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('jobid', address[1]);
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
	} else {
		gs.info("originator not SMA_OPCON");
	}
}
catch(ex) {
 var message = ex.message;
}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-27 10:46:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1a7584a4db8200101e349b81ca9619e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpConTicketRestart</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpConAPI" source="x_176837_opconapi">60b774dadb3500101e349b81ca961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpConAPI">60b774dadb3500101e349b81ca961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1a7584a4db8200101e349b81ca9619e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-27 10:51:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1a7584a4db8200101e349b81ca9619e5"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">incident_state=8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="incident_state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpConTicketCancelled</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

try 
{
	var originator = current.correlation_display;
	if(originator == 'SMA_OPCON') {
		gs.info("Ticket canceled so set SMA_OPCON task " + current.correlation_id + " to cancel");
		var retinfo = current.correlation_id;
		var address = retinfo.split(",");
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_176837_opconapi.updateJobStatusByJobId', 'postStatus');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('address', address[0]);
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('status', 'cancel');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('jobid', address[1]);
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
	} else {
		gs.info("originator not SMA_OPCON");
	}
}
catch(ex) {
 var message = ex.message;
}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-27 08:41:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0fd82b14db4200101e349b81ca961978</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpConTicketCancelled</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpConAPI" source="x_176837_opconapi">60b774dadb3500101e349b81ca961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpConAPI">60b774dadb3500101e349b81ca961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0fd82b14db4200101e349b81ca961978</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-27 10:50:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0fd82b14db4200101e349b81ca961978"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">state=6^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="6"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpConTicketResolved</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

try 
{
	var originator = current.correlation_display;
	if(originator == 'SMA_OPCON') {
		gs.info("Ticket resolved so set SMA_OPCON task " + current.correlation_id + " to markFixed");
		var retinfo = current.correlation_id;
		var address = retinfo.split(",");
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_176837_opconapi.updateJobStatusByJobId', 'postStatus');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('address', address[0]);
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('status', 'markFixed');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('jobid', address[1]);
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
	} else {
		gs.info("originator not SMA_OPCON");
	}
}
catch(ex) {
 var message = ex.message;
}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-27 08:39:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>80182314db4200101e349b81ca961922</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpConTicketResolved</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpConAPI" source="x_176837_opconapi">60b774dadb3500101e349b81ca961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpConAPI">60b774dadb3500101e349b81ca961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_80182314db4200101e349b81ca961922</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-27 10:50:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=80182314db4200101e349b81ca961922"/></record_update>
